customSecurityGroupId.description: The identifier of your custom security group. Should relate to the same VPC, where workspaces reside in.

defaultOu.description: The default organizational unit (OU) for your WorkSpace directories. Should conform `"OU=<value>,DC=<value>,...,DC=<value>"` pattern.

enableInternetAccess.description: Indicates whether internet access is enabled for your WorkSpaces.

enableMaintenanceMode.description: Indicates whether maintenance mode is enabled for your WorkSpaces. For more information, see [WorkSpace Maintenance](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/workspaces/latest/adminguide/workspace-maintenance.html)..

userEnabledAsLocalAdministrator.description: Indicates whether users are local administrators of their WorkSpaces.
